title: Stixis scandens leaf extract-loading ZnO nanoparticles for porcine epidemic diarrhea virus (PEDV) treatment
content:
RSC Adv., 2024, 14,8779-8789
DOI: 10.1039/D3RA08928B, Paper
Open Access
  This article is licensed under a Creative Commons Attribution-NonCommercial 3.0 Unported Licence.
Thi Thu Huong Le, Thi Tam Than, Thi Ngọc Ha Lai, Van Phan Le
Various nanoformulations of ZnO and Stixis scandens leaf extract were successfully synthesized. The A1T nanoformulation, containing only 7.6% extract, showed an equivalent anti-PEDV activity with the extract.
